channel.title: CVE Feed for Veeam -- Recovery Orchestrator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Veeam -- Recovery Orchestrator

item.title: CVE-2024-29855|2024-08-02T01:17:58.173Z -- veeam -- recovery%20orchestrator
item.description: Hard-coded JWT secret allows authentication bypass in Veeam Recovery Orchestrator

item.title: CVE-2024-22022|2024-07-05T17:21:41.337Z -- veeam -- recovery%20orchestrator
item.description: Vulnerability CVE-2024-22022 allows a Veeam Recovery Orchestrator user that has been assigned a low-privileged role to access the NTLM hash of the service account used by the Veeam Orchestrator Server Service.

item.title: CVE-2024-22021|2024-07-05T17:21:38.648Z -- veeam -- recovery%20orchestrator
item.description: Vulnerability CVE-2024-22021 allows a Veeam Recovery Orchestrator user with a low privileged role (Plan Author) to retrieve plans from a Scope other than the one they are assigned to.

item.title: CVE-2024-22021|2024-02-07T00:53:30.493Z -- veeam -- recovery%20orchestrator
item.description: Vulnerability CVE-2024-22021 allows a Veeam Recovery Orchestrator user with a low privileged role (Plan Author) to retrieve plans from a Scope other than the one they are assigned to.

item.title: CVE-2024-22022|2024-02-07T00:53:30.523Z -- veeam -- recovery%20orchestrator
item.description: Vulnerability CVE-2024-22022 allows a Veeam Recovery Orchestrator user that has been assigned a low-privileged role to access the NTLM hash of the service account used by the Veeam Orchestrator Server Service.

item.description: Hard-coded JWT secret allows authentication bypass in Veeam Recovery Orchestrator
